name: Symbiotic (itch)
description:
This is an entry into the United Game Jam 2020.

The theme is "Two".

After a decades long war, the conflict is finally approaching it's resolution. The forces of the Kingdom of Anur are decimated. The Borg machine core is approaching, destroying everything in it's path. HMS Javelin is the last capital ship standing capable of stoping the machine onslaught. His Royal Highness King Micah stationed the ship for a last stand at Anuria, our homeworld.

You play as Echo and Aurora, symbiotic twins that move in sync. Provide fighter support to the HMS Javelin, destroying the borg kamikaze fleet that is trying to disable HMS Javelin's shields.

**NOTES**

***EPILEPSY WARNING***

The game is visually stimulating and pretty hectic, please take care if you have photosensitive epilepsy.

Windows build is untested as I develop on mac and don't  have a win machine.

All assets and code were created specifically for this game jam except:

Soundtrack - Reused soundtrack from previous game jam entry 'Pestilence'

Ice and Terran planet pixel art - https://helianthus-games.itch.io/pixel-art-planets
